definition.featurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="feature_container" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><value name="feature"><block type="feature_replace_sphere" inline="false"><comment pinned="false" h="114" w="249">This block represents a blob feature that replaces netherrack with blackstone, like the ones that generate in the Nether.This feature should be generated during the UNDERGROUND_DECORATION stage</comment><value name="targetState"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:BauxiteBlock</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block being replaced (in this case netherrack)</comment></block></value><value name="newState"><block type="mcitem_allblocks"><field name="value">CUSTOM:Jaspilite</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the block that will be placed by the feature (in this case blackstone)</comment></block></value><value name="radius"><block type="int_provider_uniform"><field name="min">1</field><field name="max">2</field><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">This is the size of the blob</comment></block></value></block></value><next><block type="placement_count"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We try to generate up to 25 blackstone blobs in each chunk</comment><value name="count"><block type="int_provider_constant"><field name="value">5</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_in_square"><comment pinned="false" h="83" w="182">We then move each blob horizontally. This way they don't generate only in the corner of the chunk</comment><next><block type="placement_height_triangular"><value name="min"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">32</field></block></value><value name="max"><block type="vertical_anchor_absolute"><field name="value">128</field></block></value><next><block type="placement_biome_filter"><comment pinned="false" h="80" w="160">We add a biome filter, so that the blobs don't generate outside of the current biome</comment></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
